entry.title: Toofan Mail - Best Comedy Scene - Madhuri Dixit, Ashok Saraf - Abodh
entry.content:
![Toofan Mail - Best Comedy Scene - Madhuri Dixit, Ashok Saraf - Abodh](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xu5fpMuqrRs/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)

Check out the best comedy scene from the bollywood classic romantic hindi family drama movie Abodh (1984) starring Madhuri Dixit, Tapas Pal, Vinod Sharma, Ashok Saraf, Mohan Choti & Dinesh Hingoo. Directed by Hiren Nag & Produced by Tarachand Barjatya. Music by Ravindra Jain.

Check out the hindi comedy scene from the superhit bollywood family drama movie Bahu Beta Aur Maa (1992) starring Satish Kaul, Rama Viz, Yogesh Chabra, Pravin Sood, Asha Chandra & Tiku Talsania. Directed by Pawan Dev & Produced by K.L Batra. Music by Surendra Kohli.

Watch the superhit hindi fun scene from the bollywood classic hindi movie Raftaar (1975) starring Moushmi Chatterjee, Vinod Mehra,Danny Denzongpa, Ranjeet, Madan Puri & Sunder. Directed by Dinesh — Ramanesh. Produced by S.I Shivadasani. Music by Sonik Omi.

Watch the best comedy fall scene from the bollywood superhit action adventure romantic hindi movie Diljalaa (1987) starring Jackie Shroff, Farha Naaz, Rita Bhaduri, Danny Denzongpa, Satish Shah & Annu Kapoor. Directed by Bapu. Music by Bappi Lahiri.

entry.title: Sanjay Dutt Loves Going to Jail - Thanedaar - Superhit Scene - Madhuri Dixit
entry.content:
![Sanjay Dutt Loves Going To Jail - Thanedaar - Superhit Scene - Madhuri Dixit](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/y3oKAknz0g0/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Sanjay Dutt Loves Going To Jail - Thanedaar - Superhit Scene - Madhuri Dixit](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/y3oKAknz0g0/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Sanjay Dutt Loves Going To Jail - Thanedaar - Superhit Scene - Madhuri Dixit](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/y3oKAknz0g0/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Sanjay Dutt Loves Going To Jail - Thanedaar - Superhit Scene - Madhuri Dixit](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/y3oKAknz0g0/3.jpg =1580x150)

Watch an interesting hindi scene from the bollywood classic blockbuster action romantic hindi movie Thanedaar (1990) where Sanjay Dutt claims that he loves going to jail and wants to come back again! Find out why. The film stars superstar Sanjay Dutt, Madhuri Dixit, Jeetendra & Jaya Prada. Directed by Raj N. Sippy & Produced by Sanjay Ray. Music by Bappi Lahiri.
